the daluwala pahaya saha nawum bawa surakena paridi nawathama foyil aawaranayakin yuthuwa baෲk bond silonta welendapolata nikuth kare.baෲk bond silonta yali handunwadime awasthawata sahabhagiwu samagame alewi adhyaksha asanga ranasinha mema nawa welenda namaya yatathe handunwa dena thewala rasayata lankiya janathawa wadath ruchi karanu athayi pawasiya.kalak rate uthuru naenganahira janathawa atharath itha janapriyawa pawathi silonta the menma baෲk bond silonta welenda namaya da uthuru nangenahira janathawa thadin aakarshanaya karanu athayi ee mahatha kiya.baෲk bond nipayum jathyantharaya wetha genayamata da apekshithaya.

ayatha margawalin rupiyal harakoti anu delakshayak (ru. 4,920,0000) mudalak upayagena athayi parlimenthu manthri wimal wirawanshata erehiwa allas ho dushana wancha wimarshana komisama wisin nowambar 30da kolambaa mahadhikaranaye nadu pawara atha.
pranshaya, ithaliya, engalanthaya wani ratawal mema ulela niyojanaya kala.
“apata me de danaganna karanna puluwan ekama deyayi.
sori wenna oona...ikamanata ithiriyath liyannam ayiya....
mama mahindawa wiwechanaya karanawa ahila ada ofisiye kenek kiwwa kathawak.
mama nam oya kiyana dawas weddi shrawasthiyata wadinawa…
